text: Nice mosque. The staff are very friendly and provided coverings for us to enter and see the exhibits.
Welcome to Masjid Abdul Gafoor! Built in 1859, this mosque is one of Singapore‚Äôs National Monuments. Open for visits daily except Friday, 10am - 12pm, 2pm - 4pm

Masjid Abdul Gafoor, a beautiful heritage mosque, is conveniently located just behind Rochor MRT, making it easily accessible on foot. However, drivers beware: the surrounding roads are often congested, especially at night due to nearby restaurants and bars

Beautiful mosque located in the end of Dunlop street. 5 mins walk from Tekka centre. Situated in the road itself, hence easy to locate.
